content:
Define a 16-bit wide output register 'out' to hold the output of the multiplexer.

Retrieved Related Information:
- out: 16-bit output signal which is the result of the multiplexer selection (Type:Signal)
- sel=4 chooses e (Type:StateTransition)
- sel=9 to 15 set all output bits to '1' (Type:StateTransition)
- sel=1 chooses b (Type:StateTransition)
- sel=2 chooses c (Type:StateTransition)
- sel=3 chooses d (Type:StateTransition)

Implement a combinational logic block to select input 'a' when 'sel' equals 0 and assign it to 'out'.

Retrieved Related Information:
- a: 16-bit input signal (Type:Signal)
- sel: 4-bit input signal used to select one of the 9 input signals (Type:Signal)
- out: 16-bit output signal which is the result of the multiplexer selection (Type:Signal)
- sel=0 chooses a (Type:StateTransition)

Implement a combinational logic block to select input 'b' when 'sel' equals 1 and assign it to 'out'.

Retrieved Related Information:
- b: 16-bit input signal
- sel: 4-bit input signal used to select one of the 9 input signals
- out: 16-bit output signal which is the result of the multiplexer selection
- sel=1 chooses b (Type:StateTransition)

Implement a combinational logic block to select input 'c' when 'sel' equals 2 and assign it to 'out'.

Retrieved Related Information:
- c: 16-bit input signal
- sel: 4-bit input signal used to select one of the 9 input signals
- out: 16-bit output signal which is the result of the multiplexer selection
- sel=2 chooses c

Implement a combinational logic block to select input 'd' when 'sel' equals 3 and assign it to 'out'.

Retrieved Related Information:
- d: 16-bit input signal
- out: 16-bit output signal which is the result of the multiplexer selection
- sel=3 chooses d

Implement a combinational logic block to select input 'e' when 'sel' equals 4 and assign it to 'out'.

Retrieved Related Information:
- e: 16-bit input signal (Type:Signal)
- sel: 4-bit input signal used to select one of the 9 input signals (Type:Signal)
- out: 16-bit output signal which is the result of the multiplexer selection (Type:Signal)
- sel=4 chooses e (Type:StateTransition)

Implement a combinational logic block to select input 'f' when 'sel' equals 5 and assign it to 'out'.

- f: 16-bit input signal
- out: 16-bit output signal which is the result of the multiplexer selection
- sel=5 chooses f

Retrieved Related Information:
- g: 16-bit input signal
- out: 16-bit output signal which is the result of the multiplexer selection

- h: 16-bit input signal
- out: 16-bit output signal which is the result of the multiplexer selection

Implement a combinational logic block to select input 'i' when 'sel' equals 8 and assign it to 'out'.

Retrieved Related Information:
- i: 16-bit input signal (Type:Signal)
- sel=8 chooses i (Type:StateTransition)
Implement a combinational logic block to set all bits of 'out' to '1' for 'sel' values from 9 to 15.
source: For the unused cases (sel=9 to 15), set all output bits to '1'.
